El Ministerio TIC cuenta con un programa que se llama carpeta ciudadana 

Servicio de carpeta ciudadana: Es aquel que permite el almacenamiento y conservación electrónica de mensajes de datos en la nube para las personas naturales o jurídicas, en donde éstas pueden recibir, custodiar y compartir de manera segura y confiable
la información generada en su relación con el Estado a nivel de trámites y servicios. En ningún caso la carpeta ciudadana hará las veces de sistema de gestión de documentos electrónicos
de archivo.

In particular in the case of prepaid mobile services, there is an obligation to periodically check the identity of the subscribers / users, the data provided by the subscriber must match the official identity documents. The operator has the obligation to check the identity upon the conclusion of the contract and then at least yearly afterwards. The checks must be performed against a central official repository of identity documents via electronic means.

All nationals and foreign residents are required to have a digitized civil identification number that is associated with their basic information, this is used by all operators for any transaction. further the same is applied to residents and business offices through the digitized civil data information program.

According to the national identification Registry,the new national ID card system/biometric ID card issued by will be required to open bank accounts, to register to vote, and even do SIM registration. If you don’t have the biometric ID card you cannot use your SIM card, the ID card will be required to do your SIM registration. You will also use it to open your bank account, do your voter registration, obtain a driver’s license among others.
